name: Sacre Bleu - Demo
description:
SteamPunk-Paris: 1650

Experience the bullet-time Musketeer-Frenzy!
Steam-blast your way through 1650-Prison of Bastille - Paris

  • Bullet-time combat
  • Steam-blast-rocket-jumping
  • Timer-stats for speed-runners
  • Demo is  7 levels + 2 bosses (45 min)
  • 2.5 D Cartoon-graphics
  • Best pretend-French you'll find anywhere
Story

You are a Musketeer imprisoned on false charges.
Steam-blast your way out and find the evil-doers who framed you.
Uncover a plot to take over France!



We need your help!

Sacre Bleu is in active development and we need your feedback!

  • Play the game here
  • Fill out the feedback-form
  • You can win $50 USD steam-gift-card

Enter your feedback here.  If you include a +2 minute video of you playing you can enter the competition to win $50 USD steam-gift-card. 
Competition ends 25-SEP-2020

Requirements:
  • Windows PC (reasonably fast)
  • Game-Pad - no mouse/keyboard support yet
